divs: Sighting DetailsI have a fleet of UFOs following me for years. I have witnesses and their phone numbers. These crafts that's been following me can be sighted on clear night sky's. For the past six months I have a group of UFO hunters that we sighted a fleet of UFOs flying over our UFO meetup group in New York city. I am now pursuing an investigation of two UFO fleets in the vicinity of New York city. Anyone interested to view the fleet that been following me for years can get in touch with me. I will get in touch with a Mufon investigator and show him the video of the UFO flying over New York city. Then I will show him the fleet that's been following me for years in a panoramic view of the sky to see this complete fleet.
Summary: I have a fleet of UFOs following me for years and also sighted a second fleet of UFOs over NYC
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around October 30th 2011
